game.name: Chota Bheem Cricket Panga
game.description:
Chota Bheem lovers are everywhere. Right from the kids and teens to the young age individuals and grown-ups ? everyone wants to enrol into an activity that features this most popular character from a famous Indian animated comedy adventure television series. Chota Bheem Cricket Panga is an excellent brand new sports game where you will get a chance to meet with this most renowned personality of Indian online gaming industry. 

Kalia and her clan has just challenged Chota Bheem along with his friends. So, your job in this cute free online cricket game is to help Chota Bheem to give a solid reply to all his opponents. Make sure that you perform the best in all these three areas: batting, bowling and fielding to allow him face as many bowlers as he can and win every match. A very important match is going to be placed, so please use your best cricketing skills to help Chota Bheem to bring the trophy to his home. 

Chota Bheem have a complete faith on you, so please do not do anything that could break his trust and lose you to your opponent. The maximum score you will hit on the scoreboard, the bigger smile you can see on the face of Chota bheem and his friends in this cool html5 game. Your expertise about the cricketing world and patience will definitely help face all the hard bowlers alone. Good luck boys and girls to save some good runs and make the highest score when your team plays!
